verses.text: Sing aloud \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w our|strong="H5921"\w* strength! Make \w a|strong="H3068"\w* joyful shout \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* God \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Jacob!

\w Raise|strong="H7321"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* song, \w and|strong="H3290"\w* bring here \w the|strong="H7321"\w* tambourine, \w the|strong="H7321"\w* pleasant lyre \w with|strong="H7442"\w* \w the|strong="H7321"\w* harp.

Blow \w the|strong="H5414"\w* trumpet \w at|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* New Moon, \w at|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* full moon, \w on|strong="H5375"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* feast day.

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* statute \w for|strong="H3117"\w* Israel, \w an|strong="H8628"\w* ordinance \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* God \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Jacob.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w appointed|strong="H2706"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* Joseph \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w went|strong="H3478"\w* out over \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H4941"\w* Egypt, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* language \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* didn’t know.

“\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w removed|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* shoulder \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* burden. \w His|strong="H7760"\w* hands \w were|strong="H4714"\w* freed \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* basket.

\w You|strong="H3709"\w* called \w in|strong="H5493"\w* trouble, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* I \w delivered|strong="H5674"\w* \w you|strong="H3709"\w*. I answered \w you|strong="H3709"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* secret place \w of|strong="H3709"\w* thunder. I tested \w you|strong="H3709"\w* \w at|strong="H3709"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* waters \w of|strong="H3709"\w* Meribah.” \qs Selah.\qs*

“\w Hear|strong="H6030"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* people, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* \w testify|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, Israel, if \w you|strong="H5921"\w* would listen \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*!

There \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H3478"\w* strange god \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H5971"\w*, neither \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H5971"\w* \w worship|strong="H3478"\w* any foreign god.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w who|strong="H2114"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* land \w of|strong="H3808"\w* Egypt. Open \w your|strong="H1961"\w* mouth wide, \w and|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* fill \w it|strong="H1961"\w*.
\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* people didn’t listen \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice. Israel desired none \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w* \w go|strong="H5971"\w* after \w the|strong="H8085"\w* stubbornness \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* hearts, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w might|strong="H3478"\w* walk \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* counsels.

Oh \w that|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w* would listen \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*, \w that|strong="H3820"\w* Israel would \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* ways!

\w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* soon subdue \w their|strong="H8085"\w* enemies, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w turn|strong="H5971"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* hand \w against|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* adversaries.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* haters \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H6862"\w* cringe \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w punishment|strong="H3027"\w* \w would|strong="H6862"\w* last forever.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* fed \w them|strong="H8130"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* finest \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* wheat. \w I|strong="H6256"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* satisfy \w you|strong="H8130"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* honey out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* rock.”
